adaptability.effect: Powers up moves of the same type.

aftermath.effect: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

analytic.effect: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

angerpoint.effect: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

battlebond.effect: Transform into Ash-Greninja after causing opponent to faint.

beadsofruin.effect: Lowers Special Defense of all Pokémon except itself.

berserk.effect: Raises Special Attack when HP drops below half.

bigpecks.effect: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

blaze.effect: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

bulletproof.effect: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

cheekpouch.effect: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

chillingneigh.effect: Boosts Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

chlorophyll.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

clearbody.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

commander.effect: Goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field.

competitive.effect: Sharply raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

contrary.effect: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

corrosion.effect: The Pokémon can poison Steel and Poison types.

costar.effect: Copies ally's stat changes on entering battle.

cudchew.effect: Can eat the same Berry twice.

curiousmedicine.effect: Resets all stat changes upon entering battlefield.

cursedbody.effect: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

cutecharm.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

damp.effect: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

dazzling.effect: Protects the Pokémon from high-priority moves.

defiant.effect: Sharply raises Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

drizzle.effect: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

drought.effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dryskin.effect: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

effectspore.effect: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

electromorphosis.effect: Doubles power of the next Electric-type move when hit by an attack.

flamebody.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

flareboost.effect: Powers up special attacks when burned.

flashfire.effect: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

flowerveil.effect: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

fluffy.effect: Halves damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.

frisk.effect: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

gluttony.effect: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

gooey.effect: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

grassysurge.effect: The Pokémon creates a Grassy Terrain when it enters a battle.

grimneigh.effect: Boosts Special Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

guarddog.effect: Boosts Attack if intimidated, and prevents being forced to switch out.

guts.effect: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

hadronengine.effect: Creates an Electric Terrain when entering battle, and boosts Special Attack while active.

harvest.effect: May create another Berry after one is used.

healer.effect: May heal an ally's status conditions.

heatproof.effect: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

honeygather.effect: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

hustle.effect: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

hydration.effect: Heals status problems if it is raining.

hypercutter.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

icebody.effect: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

illusion.effect: Enters battle disguised as the last Pokémon in the party.

immunity.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

imposter.effect: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

infiltrator.effect: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

innerfocus.effect: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

ironfist.effect: Boosts the power of punching moves.

justified.effect: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

keeneye.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

leafguard.effect: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

levitate.effect: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

libero.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

limber.effect: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

longreach.effect: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

magicguard.effect: Protects the Pokémon from indirect damage.

magician.effect: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

marvelscale.effect: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.

merciless.effect: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

mistysurge.effect: The Pokémon creates a Misty Terrain when it enters a battle.

moldbreaker.effect: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

moxie.effect: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

multiscale.effect: Reduces damage when HP is full.

multitype.effect: Changes type to match the held Plate.

myceliummight.effect: Status moves go last, but are not affected by the opponent's ability.

naturalcure.effect: All status problems heal when it switches out.

neutralizinggas.effect: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.

opportunist.effect: Copies stat boosts by the opponent.

orichalcumpulse.effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when entering battle, and boosts Attack while active.

overcoat.effect: Protects the Pokémon from weather damage.

overgrow.effect: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

owntempo.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

pickpocket.effect: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

pixilate.effect: Turns Normal-type moves into Fairy-type moves.

poisonheal.effect: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

poisonpoint.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

poisontouch.effect: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

powerofalchemy.effect: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

prankster.effect: Gives priority to a status move.

pressure.effect: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

propellertail.effect: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

protean.effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

protosynthesis.effect: Raises highest stat in harsh sunlight, or if holding Booster Energy.

purifyingsalt.effect: Protects from status conditions and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.

quarkdrive.effect: Raises highest stat on Electric Terrain, or if holding Booster Energy.

quickfeet.effect: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

raindish.effect: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

rattled.effect: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

reckless.effect: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

regenerator.effect: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

rockhead.effect: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

roughskin.effect: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.

runaway.effect: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

sandforce.effect: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

sandrush.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

sandspit.effect: Creates a sandstorm when hit by an attack.

sandstream.effect: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

sandveil.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

sapsipper.effect: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

scrappy.effect: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

seedsower.effect: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

serenegrace.effect: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

shedskin.effect: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

sheerforce.effect: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

shellarmor.effect: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

shielddust.effect: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

skilllink.effect: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

slushrush.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

snowwarning.effect: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

soulheart.effect: Raises Special Attack when another Pokémon faints.

speedboost.effect: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

stakeout.effect: Deals double damage to Pokémon switching in.

stall.effect: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

static.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

steadfast.effect: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

steamengine.effect: Drastically raises Speed when hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

stickyhold.effect: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

stormdrain.effect: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

strongjaw.effect: Boosts the power of biting moves.

sturdy.effect: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

supremeoverlord.effect: Attack and Special Attack are boosted for each party Pokémon that has been defeated.

swarm.effect: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

sweetveil.effect: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

swiftswim.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

swordofruin.effect: Lowers Defense of all Pokémon except itself.

symbiosis.effect: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

synchronize.effect: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

tabletsofruin.effect: Lowers Attack of all Pokémon except itself.

tangledfeet.effect: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

technician.effect: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

telepathy.effect: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

thermalexchange.effect: Raises Attack when hit by a Fire-type move. Cannot be burned.

thickfat.effect: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

torrent.effect: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

toughclaws.effect: Boosts the power of contact moves.

toxicdebris.effect: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

trace.effect: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

unaware.effect: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

unburden.effect: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

unnerve.effect: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

unseenfist.effect: Contact moves can strike through Protect/Detect.

vesselofruin.effect: Lowers Special Attack of all Pokémon except itself.

vitalspirit.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

voltabsorb.effect: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

waterabsorb.effect: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

watercompaction.effect: Sharply raises Defense when hit by a Water-type move.

waterveil.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

weakarmor.effect: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

whitesmoke.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

windpower.effect: Doubles power of the next Electric-type move used, when hit by a wind move.

windrider.effect: Takes no damage from wind moves, and boosts Attack if hit by one.

wonderskin.effect: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

zerotohero.effect: Transforms into its Hero Form when switching out.
